micaiah8.name: Micaiah
micaiah8.title: Of Dawn
micaiah8.description: One of the Emblems who were summoned to Elyos. Resides in the Ring of the Dawn Maiden. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn / Fire Emblem Engage.
micaiah8.emblem:
【Switch】
Enhanced Engaged Special
When Special triggers, boosts damage by unit's max Special cooldown count value × 4 (excluding area-of-effect Specials).
If a Rally or movement Assist skill is used by unit, restores 20 HP to target ally and neutralizes any【Penalty】on that ally, and grants another action to unit and inflicts 【Isolation】on unit and Pair Up cohort through their next action, and also, if unit's or Pair Up Cohort's Range = 2, inflicts "restricts movement to 1 space" on unit and Pair Up cohort, respectively, through their next action ("grants another action" effect and onward is once per turn; if another effect that grants additional action to unit has been triggered at the same time, this effect is also considered to have been triggered).
Enhanced Engaged Special
When Special triggers, boosts damage by unit's max Special cooldown count value × 4 (excluding area-of-effect Specials).
If a Rally or movement Assist skill is used by unit, restores 20 HP to target ally and neutralizes any【Penalty】on that ally, and grants another action to unit and inflicts 【Isolation】on unit and Pair Up cohort through their next action, and also, if unit's or Pair Up Cohort's Range = 2, inflicts "restricts movement to 1 space" on unit and Pair Up cohort, respectively, through their next action ("grants another action" effect and onward is once per turn; if another effect that grants additional action to unit has been triggered at the same time, this effect is also considered to have been triggered).
【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).
【Isolation】
Target cannot use or be the target of Assist skills through its next action. (Target can neither use nor be the target of skills like Dance and Sing, skills that neutralize penalties, like Restore and Harsh Command+, etc.)

Castle Hall: Whenever I see small, orange birds, I am reminded of Yune. But here, I can meet with the real Yune.

When I was in Elyos, I was entrusted to the kingdom of Firene as a ring, which was hidden in a shrine.
I only awoke when I sensed the revival of the Fell Dragon.
Even after a thousand years, Emblems do not change. I am no longer alone here, watching others come and go.

It is true that Emblems do not need food to survive. But things are different here in Askr.
I look forward to sharing a meal with the Dawn Brigade and my allies, just like old times.
My power was helpful when I used it to bear the injuries of others. But if my engage partner used it...I worried.
Visit: I feel strange and...nostalgic here, as if I know this place... I have a greeting from [F].
Level: I foresaw a favorable outcome, but it was your strength that made it happen.
Hope will never fade from any world. I will not allow that to happen.
Let us use the power I have now to turn the tides of this battle.
Summon: I am Emblem Micaiah. I sense the future shifting... Now victory lies ahead. Let us go together.
Learn Skill: This power you have granted me comforts me. I can truly feel how much you care. Thank you.
Confession:
It is rare for you to be resting in the shade of these trees... Do you need something, [S]?
Ah... Of course, I can read your fortune... You must be anxious about the battles to come.
You must not worry though... I see a bright future—a radiant future—you and your allies will grasp together.
Hehehe... I am glad to see you smile.
When I was in Elyos and Tellius, nothing warmed my spirit like seeing my allies smile.
This may be asking too much as an Emblem, but...I hope to heal spirits as well as bodies on the battlefield.
I will happily stay by your side until a time of peace when you can smile from the bottom of your heart.
Let us continue on this path together.
Status: You have warm hands. That warmth is a sign that you are cared for deeply.
Ah! You approached so unexpectedly. Are you hurt? Is there a fortune you wish me to read?
I am fond of this appearance. Wreathed in blue flame... It is as though I am meant to match Yune.
My ring was hidden in a shrine in Firene, but Yunaka heard my voice and brought me out of it.
"Heal us, Emblem of Dawn..." That is the invocation to summon me. It will aid you. Of that I am certain.
It pleases me to see Sothe and others who inspire so many memories... Though, I knew I would come here.
None of the Micaiahs from whom I originate could have foreseen becoming an Emblem. Like them, you also have limitless potential.
